title: I LOVE IT
lyrics:
Ne ibsulgwa hyanggiga joha neoui gin
Dariwa jjalbeun chima joha
You see that nuni ganeun eongdeongi
I love it
Nado moreuge tto soni ganeun heori
Ooh I like it ganeun balmogi

Haihil wie haru jongil baby

Could you be my lady

Cuz I know you want it

Igeon keulleob anim bar

Sky lounge sky high

Kaejueol malgo deo dress uphae

Meomchuji malgo gyesoghae rose dom p cigar ttago

Heungbun dwae anim malgo rarty like met gara

Urin noneun muri dalla ne nunbitgwa maltuga

Nan joha neoui gin meoriwa

Ko kkeute jeom joha naneun joha

You see that nuni ganeun eongdeongi

I love it nado moreuge tto soni ganeun heori

(Ooh) I like it ganeun balmogi haihil wie haru jongil baby

Could you be my lady, cuz I know you want it

Jigeumi myeot shinjineun, tto eodinjineun, jungyohaji anha

Naega nugun jineun, mwol haneun jineun

Mureo boji mara girl geunyang ireohge

Jeulgida jibe gabeorimyeon dwae

Seoro bimillo mudeo nohgo

Ne kkaman seutaking neomu joha

Ne ppalgan ribseutig neomu joha

Ne yahan miso beomu joha

Ne modeun geoshi neomu joha

Geunyeoui Ibsulgwa hyanggiga

Joha

(Yeah) Neoui gin, nariwa, jjalbeun chima

Joha

Neomu joha, daeche neon eodiseo watni, wae jigeum natanatni

Eojjeom geurido wanbyeog hanji

Neol bomyeon neul gamgyeog haji

Neomu balga jomyeongeul jurilge

Jal bwa na kki jom burige

Seon nyeowa namukkun bodaneun

Sugnyeowa nanbongkkun ne nunbitgwa maltuga nan joha, neoui gin meoriwa

Ko kkeute jeom, joha naneun joha, jigeumi myeot shinjineun, tto eodinjineun jungyohaji anha

Naega nugun jineun, mwol haneun jineun

Mureo boji mara girl, geunyang ireohge

Jeulgida jibe gabeorimyeon dwae

Seoro bimillo mudeo nohgo (Yeah)

Gatta love it brought you by G-Dragon

Boys Noize, Zion T, and your girl neomu joha
